objects.text:
• Handcrafted Bohemian Design
• Premium Leather Construction
• Comfortable Padded Insole
• Durable Rubber Outsole

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
This banner features a stylish promotional layout for a boho-chic sneaker product. The composition is split diagonally, creating visual interest with warm, earthy quadrants in shades of beige and brown. The promotional text elements are strategically placed to the left. The prominent headline ("heading") is in bold uppercase font with a dark chestnut brown tone. Just below it, the subheading ("subheading") uses a slick condensed typeface in burnt sienna. The feature list ("description") is presented in a bullet format, reinforcing product benefits. Price information ("price") and a dark brown call-to-action button labeled “SHOP NOW” ("cta") capture attention below. On the right, a 3D-rendered sneaker ("product_image") is the clear visual focal point. A subtle callout message ("tagline") reinforces urgency. Background graphics add depth and rich textural detail without clutter.

**Color Palette**:
- Cream (#F5E6D3)
- Light Beige (#E8D5B9)
- Sand (#D9BD91)
- Oak Brown (#C9A87A)
- Tan (#E0C9A6)
- Chestnut (#8B5A2B)
- Espresso (#6B4226)
- Dark Walnut (#4B2E16)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a unique and creative shoe design featuring a warm, earthy color palette. Dominant tones include tan (#EAC39B), light beige (#F6E1C3), and rich caramel brown (#A14F27) seen in the laces and accents. These shades blend seamlessly to provide tonal harmony, while textured details and highlights—like the creamy trim (#FFF3E1) and burnt orange mesh (#D1692B)—add visual interest. The sole and inner outline contrast subtly with light gray (#D2D5D7), balancing warmth with neutrality. These colors emphasize craftsmanship and creativity, making them perfect for an advertising banner that conveys personality, comfort, and artisanal flair.
